mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (user_id, board_title, board_content, board_category, board_public, board_thumbnail) VALUE (#{userId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardCategory}, #{boardPublic}, #{boardThumbnail})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND board_public = 1 ORDER BY board_created_at DESC
SELECT b.id, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_created_at, b.board_category, u.user_nickname, u.user_id,u.id AS uId FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE b.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_title = #{boardTitle}, board_content = #{boardContent}, board_category = #{boardCategory}, board_updated_at = now(), board_public = #{boardPublic}, board_thumbnail = #{boardThumbnail} WHERE id = #{id}
